001package ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.poster;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.PosterConfig;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
005
006/**
007 * Protocol-specific pipeline that reads reconstructed message pairs and emits poster reports.
008 *
009 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
010 */
011public interface PosterPipeline {
012  /**
013   * Returns the protocol handled by this pipeline.
014   *
015   * @return protocol identifier
016   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
017   */
018  ProtocolId protocol();
019
020  /**
021   * Processes poster inputs and writes rendered output.
022   *
023   * @param config per-protocol configuration block
024   * @param decodeMode level of decoding to apply when rendering content
025   * @param outputPort output sink for rendered reports
026   * @throws Exception if processing fails
027   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
028   */
029  void process(PosterConfig.ProtocolConfig config, PosterConfig.DecodeMode decodeMode, PosterOutputPort outputPort) throws Exception;
030}
